name: Nomads of the Fallen Star
description: A trade sim & turn-based squad-RPG set in a dynamic & living sci-fi post-apocalyptic world. Take the reigns of a rag-tag scavenger gang as they unravel the mystery of the Fallen Star.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel/AMD iGPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Native 1080p, up/down-scale at 16:9 ratio.
